Name: Devil's Horn
Ingredients: 1 slice Red chili pepper (jalape√±o/fresno chili (10,000 SHU) deseeded) fine sliced
60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of two small chillies.
Lightly MUDDLE (just press) chilli pepper in base of shaker to release its flavour. (If you muddle hard then the finished cocktail will be overly spicy)
Add other ingredients and SHAKE with ice.
Garnish with chillies on rim to form devil's horns.
Review: A great balance of sweetness, sourness and spice.
History: Created in 2010 by Roger Vilalta at Banker's Bar, in the Mandarin Oriental Hotel, Barcelona, Spain.
